attributes.title: BEWARE !! DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app took 8 weeks to download, and then when i finally opened the app it was very simple and plain looking and should not have taken 8 weeks to download, on top of that it stole ALL of my information, this app is terrible, i was looking forward to using it only to be heavily disappointed, i would give 0 stars if i could but sadly 1 is the lowest i can give, please please PLEASE do NOT download this app, it will ruin your life!

attributes.title: Trump is a good president
attributes.review: He helped unemployment rates like never before more than any president has in the past decade he helped the economy bounce back after being shutdown recently. He is aware of the cabal and is trying to “drain the swamp”

attributes.title: Don’t trust this app
attributes.review: This app was made to hack into your phone and spy on it. Trump is trying to gain information about Americans while covering up his REAL intentions. In addition, my dog started acting possessed. Y’all call him your President??? He put my dog’s and my life in DANGER. My dog started walking on the ceiling and barked uncontrollably until I finally deleted the app. I didn’t trust the reviews but there’s so many 1 star review and I now believe them. Protect your dog and safety and DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP AT ALL.

attributes.title: Offensive and rude PERIODT ✨✨😸😝
attributes.review: The app is not planned out well because they is a picture of a Cheeto on the home page doesn’t work they ask you for your phone number when you jus log in I don’t recommend waste of storage and life don’t waste your time getting this app and just get subway surfers 😽✨🧿👄🧿 The Cheeto puts kids in cages doesn’t case for black lives matter and he is homophobic and transphobic so yeah THIS APP IS SO WRONG APPLE WHY WOULD YOU LET AN APP LIKE THIS ON YOUR APPLE STORE NEXT CALLER

As soon as i put in all my data in hopes of daddy trump texting me later, i saw i had to do some sort of survey, only for the first question to be do i like trump??? i LOVE papi trump😍😍😍😾😾😾😾😾 i didn’t think i needed to PROVE my loyalty because as a citizen of the United Freaking States of America, owning a gun and being a racist homophobe is already enough!!!😼😾anyways i thought that pretty disrespectful so i deleted the app! going to go and slur random people and catcall underage girls!!! bye now❤️

attributes.title: 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: so one day i was laying in bed eating my fruit cup i thought LEMME DOWNLOAD my non racist, non rapist, non homophobic, white president🥰 THE APP TOOK DAYS TO DOWNLOAD and it wasnt my wifi bc my wifi is beautiful so then days latee i download it AND I OPEN IT AND BIG ORANGE MAN POPS UP and now i am traumatized forever and to make it worse IT THREATENS ME if i didnt say praise my orange president it’d come for me and i hear sumthing under my bed AND THE ORANGE MAN POPS UP UNDERNEATH and it took my dog and threw it out the window what typa president does that now i have lost my dog😔

attributes.title: I became homeless!!!
attributes.review: This app threatened me into turning into a Cheeto like our Cheeto leader. It also stole my whole bed so I had to sleep with my PARENTS! Which was totally AWFUL because they snore like a TIGER!!! I definitely do NOT recommend this app! I also later became homeless because my parents kicked me out because I kept complaining about their snoring! So now I am sleeping under a highway (MY WAY OR THE HIGHWAYYYY) I am starving and cold!!! Please help me and let me help you by recommending to NOT get this app.

attributes.title: Don’t bother!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it immediately slowed my phone down tremendously and my battery started draining.  Don’t bother downloading this app there’s to many bugs that need to be worked out, you’d think the “self made millionaire” would put out a great app but then again he’s not “made America great again” probably because it was never great, slavery was legal at one point for crying out loud! If I could rate 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review:
This app is terrible. It took two WEEKS to download and my phone wouldn’t allow me to go on any other apps while it was downloading. It hacked my phone and I got an alert saying my information might be in danger right after I downloaded. i do
NOT recommend. if you downloaded this app, 🧚 delete it🧚❤️😊🧚🏾🧚🏿. it will be best for your protection and safety. not to mention the immense lies you will receive through text. DISGUSTANG🤢🤮

attributes.title: ⚠️ITS FAKE NEWS BE CARFUL ⚠️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because it’s supposedly the #1 app in news but apple needs to fix this right away, the app is filled with fake new that’s biased and full of propaganda. They also ask to use my personal information? Why would they need my credit card info? It’s hard for me to believe this is the real president trump app with how absolutely terrible everything was. I’m so disappointed that I will now be voting Biden 2020
